name: Forest
author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
description: Procedural forest generator that clones up to 10,000 tree models across configurable circle or rectangle distribution shapes. Spawns clustered and scattered trees with randomized scale and rotation using a UI panel for clone count, cluster density, inner radius, and area size.
